item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 7 in1 Edge Trimming Squeegee: The squeegee set has 14 ends with different shapes, which fit for any edge of your car, such as headlight, Bumper, car doors handle, Car center-console. CARTINTS brand edge trimming squeegee will help you complete vinyl film wrapping in narrow corners.4 Inches Felt Edge Squeegee: ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:37:59 UTC – Details)



7 in1 Edge Trimming Squeegee: The squeegee set has 14 ends with different shapes, which fit for any edge of your car, such as headlight, Bumper, car doors handle, Car center-console. CARTINTS brand edge trimming squeegee will help you complete vinyl film wrapping in narrow corners.
4 Inches Felt Edge Squeegee: Made of soft plastic, strong enough to improve the efficiency of smoothing vinyl film. Microfiber felt edge squeegee will not leave any scratches or marks on the thin self-adhesive paper.
Vinyl Wrap Cutter And 9mm Knife Blade: The razor cutter is safe enough for you to cut off vinyl film roll because its blade is hidden inside. The retractable 9 mm knife is the best to trim the excess vinyl film or cut the size you want. Snap off blade will miantain long time best cutting performance.
Vinyl Wrap Magnets and Work Gloves: You can use the vinyl magnet tool to hold the large vinyl film paper so that you can free your hands to finish the details from smoothing to trimming.Work gloves is the key tool to prevent hands injury, or the damages of vinyl wrap paper.
Package: 7 x blue hard edge-trimming squeegee, 2x blue felt squeegee, 2 x vinyl wrap magnet holder,1 x 9mm utility knife,10 x blades,5 x squeegee felts replacement,1 x safe red cutter, 1x black work gloves

4.5
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:37:59 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Ruitool Saw

How did we get our start?

Ruitool is specialises in woodworking tools and we have a wide range of tools that will make your work more efficient and convenient.

What makes our products unique?

1.Durable & Flexible Saw Blade

2.SK5 high-carbon steel

3.Hardened 3-Edge Teeth

4.Comfortable Handle

Why do we love what we do?

Our staff have previous experience in woodworking. We know exactly which products are really effective and easy to use. And we hope that our products will make your work easier and more enjoyable.

【Durable & Flexible Saw Blade】: The hand saw blade is made of SK5 high-carbon steel. The Japanese pull saw teeth are processed by a high-frequency hardening machine imported from Japan, and the hardness can reach HRC60-63 degrees.
【Double Edged】: One side of Japanese hand saw is 17TPI for cutting hardwood, and the other side is 14TPI for cutting softwood.
【Hardened 3-Edge Teeth】: The hand saw has three-sided grinding gear design, sharp edge, faster chip removal, and smoother cutting.
【Comfortable Handle】: Exquisite beech wood handle and slight curve design make the saw handle comfortable to hold, and the operation is more labor-saving.
【Enrich Your Woodworking Life】: Straight shank double-sided small hand saw, small and light, suitable for fine cutting and small parts production, it is the best choice for woodworking DIY.

Flexible Saw Blade

Wood saw with 1/50” ultra-thin saw blade, light weight and flexible, high toughness and wear-resistant, suitable for joinery flush cutting.

Comfortable Beech Handle

Ryoba saw non-slip durable beech wood handle, compact and beautiful. Very suitable for woodworking beginners.

Two Different TPI

Double edged design, one side tooth is 14TPI, other size is 17TPI. Can better meet different cutting needs.

Hardened 3-Edge Teeth

The three-blade serration is hardened to effectively improve the sharpness and wear resistance. The cutting speed of the saw is 3 times faster than that of an ordinary saw.

ZTE announced the launch of the Blade A5 2020 smartphone in 2019. The manufacturer is offering the ZTE Blade A5 2020 phone with 6.09 inches display, Unisoc SC9863A chipset, 2 GB of RAM and 32 GB of internal storage. The ZTE Blade A5 2020 comes with Android OS v9.0 (Pie) out of the box, and a Li-Ion 3200 mAh, non-removable battery. The 6.09 inches phone comes with IPS display (720 x 1560 px). The IPS display provides enhanced features, such as optimal viewing angles, color accuracy, invariable color reproduction and better power consumption. 2G bands: GSM 850/900/1800/1900, 3G bands: HSDPA 850/900/1900/AWS/2100, 4G bands: B2/B4/B5/B7/B28AB/B66International Model – No Warranty in the US. item.title: North Edge Apache Men’s Sports Watches for Outdoor Tactical Survival Adventure Hiking，EL Backlight，5ATM waterproof，with Military Army Altimeter Barometer，Pedometer，Pacer，Digital Wrist Watch，Large Dial
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) My team members are very passionate about outdoor sports, we often go fishing, mountain climbing, hiking, biking, outdoor tactical survival adventures, etc. together. However, nothing is 100% predictable, on the way, we encountered many contingencies such as broken compass in the jungle, sudden drop in temperature, non-waterproof watches not working, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $79.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 05:08:58 UTC – Details)


My team members are very passionate about outdoor sports, we often go fishing, mountain climbing, hiking, biking, outdoor tactical survival adventures, etc. together. However, nothing is 100% predictable, on the way, we encountered many contingencies such as broken compass in the jungle, sudden drop in temperature, non-waterproof watches not working, inability to measure distance traveled and forgetting to bring Altimeter and Barometer etc. We all love watches, so our designer Jake designed this multifunctional outdoor sports watch with a large dial and large numbers.It’s a cool great companion.
We calibrated the compass before sending. We have carefully prepared a graphical version of the manual for you to make it easier for you to use the functions of the watch.
Function :
1. Altimeter (altitude trend chart and climb rate)      
2. Barometer ( air pressure trend chart)
3. Compass             4. Thermometer         5. Weather Forecast  
6. Pedometer, step counter, calorie, distance record
7. Time functions: hour, minute, second, year(2000-2099), month, date, weekday,
8. Alarm clock (2 sets alarm clock, )       
9. Countdown timer (99:59:59~0)       10. Stopwatch (0~:59:59),
11. Worldtime functions (daylight saving time switch automatically)
12. Corporates digital compass, altimeter, barometer, Thermometer, air pressure trend and altitude trend and altitude trend
13. Button tone on or off
14. Battery life remind
15. EL Backlight
Case Thickness# 14mm       Water Resistance Depth #50m
Style#Sport Item                   Type# Digital Wrist watches
Dial Diameter#50mm           Band Material Type#nylon strap
Band Length #25cm              Band color#Black、Blue、Green                
(In-kind shooting, we try to restore the true color, but due to different lighting conditions and viewing angle of the display device, everyone’s feeling of color may be different, please refer to the actual object received)
Package Include: Watch X1, manual X1,  a black square gift box. 
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 4.09 x 4.02 x 2.99 inches; 8.78 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ Apache
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 CR2032 batteries required. (included)
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 1, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ North Edge-Apache
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09X14KH3T
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Material & Size: Dial Window #Tempered Glass, Watch Case #Stainless Steel, Watch Band #Nylon Band, Japanese battery #CR2032 18 months life. Case Size: Diameter #50.0mm/1.96”,Thickness #16mm/0.63”. Weight #117g/0.258lbs.
Usage: Suitable For indoor/outdoor sports or daily use freely, tactical training, running, hiking, swimming, fishing, climbing, cycling, Tactical Survival adventure etc.
Note: The Military tactical Watch has a big watch face with large numbers, watch weigh may feel heavier. Please Keep away from hot water and water vapor. Best to automatically or manually calibrate the various functions of the watch before use.
Great technology, Great looking watch with great features, Beautiful designer, Nice size. Package Include: Watch X1, manual X1, a black square gift box. Please contact us if you have any questions.
Band.Length: 260.0 Millimeters
Clasp type: Push Button Deployment Clasp
Item shape: Round

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $299.12 - $238.06
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:09:56 UTC – Details)


Experience 5G speeds with this unlocked Motorola edge smartphone. The 6.7-inch OLED display wraps around the edges to deliver a clear picture quality with a 90 HZ refresh rate. The Motorola edge smartphone has a 64MP triple-camera system for low-light, high-res, ultra-wide, and ultra-zoom photos. Plus, Motorola Edge comes with 6GB memory, and the 256GB of storage holds your files and applications. The 4500mAh rechargeable battery delivers up to two days of use, and the stereo sound delivers studio-quality performance.
Carrier compatibiliy: AT&T: 4G, VoLTE , Verizon: 4G, VoLTE, T Mobile: 5G sub6 NSA, VoLTE, WiFi Calling, Video Calling, Tracfone: GSM, CDMA. Does not support: Boost, U.S. Cellular, Republic Wireless, Xfinity Wireless, Spectrum, Optimum Mobile. For all carrier compatibility details – please check the product images in detail.Optical sensor resolution:64 megapixels.Display Type:OLED.Form_factor : Smartphone
In order to use this Device on Verizon first provision your SIM through Verizon Wireless . Log in to your account on Verizon Wireless . Devices – activate or switch devices – activate.
Ultra-powerful 5G performance – Experience pure speed with the next gen wireless network, plus an insanely fast processor, 6GB memory, and 256GB storage. Compatible with T-Mobile’s 5G network now. Ready for 5G on other networks dependent on carrier availability.
Immersive 90 Hz Endless Edge display – Get breathtaking HDR10 picture quality on a gorgeous 6.7” OLED display that wraps around the edges.
64MP Triple Camera System – Class-leading camera resolution lets you capture everything from super high-res to crisp low-light, and from ultra-wide to ultra-zoom.
6GB RAM , 256GB Storage – Plus, motorola edge comes loaded with 6GB memory and 256GB of storage.
Up to 2 day battery , Turbo Charging – Free yourself from power outlets with the class-leading 4500 mAh battery, and fuel up fast with TurboPower.

Read more

Compatible with T-Mobile’s 5G network now. Ready for 5G on other networks dependent on carrier availability.

Ultra-powerful 5G performance

Experience pure speed with the next gen wireless network, plus an insanely fast processor, 6GB memory, and 256GB storage.Compatible with T-Mobile’s 5G network now. Ready for 5G on other networks dependent on carrier availability.

Immersive 90 Hz Endless Edge display

New screen technology that wraps nearly 90 degrees on both sides. Get breathtaking HDR10 picture quality on a gorgeous 6.7” OLED display. Touch the screen to instantly unlock your phone. The fingerprint reader appears on the display only when you need it, then fades away.

64MP Triple Camera System

Class-leading camera resolution lets you capture everything from super high-res to crisp low-light, and from ultra-wide to ultra-zoom. 64MP (f/1.8, 0.8μm), 1/1.72″ sensor size, Quad Pixel technology for 1.6um. Shoot 4K video at 30 fps, or use video snapshot to pull a still frame in a 16MP image

Read more

Global Unlocked: use on any carrier, any plan. Ready for use when you insert your SIM.

Up to 2 day battery + Turbo Charging

Free yourself from power outlets with the class-leading 4500 mAh battery, and fuel up fast with TurboPower. The 18W TurboPower charging gives you hours of power in minutes. Actual battery performance will vary and depends on many factors including signal strength, and network

Dual stereo speakers tuned by Waves

Audio tuning technology from Waves, recipient of a Technical GRAMMY Award, delivers professional-quality sonic performance with deeper, fuller sound that envelops you. The highest output of any smartphone and award-winning audio tuning technology deliver studio-quality sonic performance.

Global Unlocked: use on any carrier.

GSM / CDMA Google Android Smartphone Compatible with all major U.S. carriers, including Verizon, AT&T, Sprint, and T Mobile. It also works with prepaid carriers, including Cricket Wireless, Metro by T-Mobile, Simple Mobile, Total Wireless, Tracfone, Net10, Mint, Tracfone, and H2O.
